message: Bitcoin story is quite impressive despite security speculations

data.message: building a whole monetary system on the cloud. and the best part that its back technology (P2P sharing) isn't new, but old.

Crypto-currency is quite impressive, I really feel it is the next iteration of monetary systems, it just had a rocky start. Stil some regulation that needs to be done but it certainly caught on fast due to the huge advantages, with now over 400 cryptocurrencies with over "$ 8,754,044,522" in market capital. 

Source : https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/views/all/

I've been following up on this whole cryptocurrency world since last December, I'm pretty impressed by the technology too, it's not just normal P2P sharing (like BitTorrent), it's a system that gets more secure with more users and you need to control more that 50% of the computing power in order to mess with it.
and I like the idea of having controlled inflation that exponentially decreases until there is zero inflation, some people say that deflationary currency will not be used as currency (because it will always be better to hold and not spend), but it's a very interesting experiment nonetheless :)
I'm also very interested in how easy it is to integrate international micro-transactions into apps and games, no more messing with paypal and smartphone stores, no middlemen :)
